data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of México.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of México, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in México, Mexico to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 14,877,405 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of México to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of México to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Spanish-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 14,097,281 people in the state of México who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in México, Mexico. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in México, Mexico to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
